keyMappings:
# previousTab, nextTab
unmap J
unmap gT
unmap K
unmap gt
# moveTabLeft, moveTabRight
unmap <<
unmap >>
# scrollLeft, scrollRight
unmap h
unmap l
# goBack, goForward
unmap H
unmap L

map h previousTab
map l nextTab
map H goBack
map L goForward
map < moveTabLeft
map > moveTabRight
map <C-u> scrollPageUp
map <C-d> scrollPageDown
map ch closeTabsOnLeft
map cl closeTabsOnRight
map co closeOtherTabs
searchEngines:
ap: https://archlinux.org/packages/?q=%s Arch Packages
au: https://aur.archlinux.org/packages?K=%s AUR Packages
aw: https://wiki.archlinux.org/index.php?search=%s Arch Wiki
d: https://duckduckgo.com/?q=%s DuckDuckGo
g: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s Google
hi: https://hello.atlassian.net/browse/%s Hello Issue
hs: https://hello.atlassian.net/wiki/search?text=%s Hello Search
n: https://github.com/nvim-tree/nvim-tree.lua/issues/%s nvim-tree Issue
o: http://go.atlassian.com/%s Go
pd: https://www.protondb.com/search?q=%s Proton DB
sd: https://steamdb.info/instantsearch/?query=%s Steam DB
ss: https://store.steampowered.com/search/?term=%s Steam Store
w: https://www.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Special:Search&search=%s Wikipedia
y: https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%s Youtube
